actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture

official_title: A bill to amend the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act to provide that the number of local committees selected under such Act shall be not less than the number of such local committees on December 31, 1980, and to amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 to provide that the members of local, county, and State committees selected under the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act shall be paid travel expenses.
short_title: Agricultural Stabilization and Conservation Committees Act of 1982

summary.text: Agricultural Stabilization and Conservation Committees Act of 1982 - Amends the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act to provide that the number of local committees selected under such Act shall be not less than the number of such local committees on December 31, 1980. Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 to provide that the members of local, county, and State committees selected under the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act shall be paid travel expenses.

titles.title: Agricultural Stabilization and Conservation Committees Act of 1982

A bill to amend the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act to provide that the number of local committees selected under such Act shall be not less than the number of such local committees on December 31, 1980, and to amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 to provide that the members of local, county, and State committees selected under the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act shall be paid travel expenses.
